entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 12:46 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -26.3°C
Wind: S 44 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blizzard developing late this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
